name: Friday Night Biden' 2: Trump's Revenge
description:
WARNING: A MULTITUDE OF EPILEPTIC SEIZURES WILL OCCUR

>> Audio is critical to the full experience <<

This game has what I'd like to call "dynamic coloring," as in the color is always changing.

The beginning phase only lasts for like 15 seconds.  It was meant as satire and I am truly sorry for doing that to you.

This was a collaborative effort.  Big thanks to the gaming crib team!

Lore drop

You beat Trump.  As president your strong leadership has been invaluable in defeating Russia and winning the Second Cold War by using an internet scam to steal all of Putin's land.  Putin, in a fit of rage, transformed into a mega lizard and revived Trump from the grave.  TREMBLE IN DESPAIR!  The republicans all rallied around Trump and gave him their lifeforce.  Trump has found his true potential and is also transgender.

Trump the Undying: "You thought you could beat ME?  Don't you know about Trump 2022?"

Joe Biden: "You'll never get away with this!  You aren't even white!"

Trump: "YOU'LL PAY FOR THAT!!!"

And with that, the two greatest anime characters of all time faced off in the most epic rap battle of history.

btw joe biden became a furry
